title: Flipped Learning Strategies to Strengthen EFL Writing Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Social sector job-linked education to enhance global communication competencies within enterprises.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three factors that reduce motivation in EFL writing.
Learners can write two English essays (descriptive/argumentative) on social topics within the first week through flipped learning-based online writing activities.
Learners can improve writing strategies by using digital feedback tools to complete peer evaluations and reflective journals.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
